title: Is Trey Gowdy Replacing Mike Pence on the 2020 GOP Ticket?
subtitle: Curious political rumor holds that Vice President Mike Pence will be stepping down from the Republican ticket in 2020 to run for a U.S. Senate seat in Indiana.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Vice President Mike Pence will be stepping down from the GOP ticket in 2020 to run for a U.S. Senate seat in Indiana.
